Class ZegoReverbAdvancedParam

Audio reverberation advanced parameters.

Developers can use the SDK's built-in presets to change the parameters of the reverb.

Hierarchy

  • ZegoReverbAdvancedParam

Properties

damping

damping: number
  • Defined in src/ZegoExpressDefines.ts:892

Reverb Damping(%), range [0.0, 100.0], controls the attenuation of the reverb, the higher the damping, the higher the attenuation.

dryGain

dryGain: number
  • Defined in src/ZegoExpressDefines.ts:901

dry gain(dB), range [-20.0, 10.0]

preDelay

preDelay: number
  • Defined in src/ZegoExpressDefines.ts:910

PreDelay(ms), range [0.0, 200.0]

reverberance

reverberance: number
  • Defined in src/ZegoExpressDefines.ts:889

Echo(%), in the range [0.0, 100.0], to control the trailing length of the reverb.

roomSize

roomSize: number
  • Defined in src/ZegoExpressDefines.ts:886

Room size(%), in the range [0.0, 1.0], to control the size of the "room" in which the reverb is generated, the larger the room, the stronger the reverb.

stereoWidth

stereoWidth: number
  • Defined in src/ZegoExpressDefines.ts:913

Stereo Width(%). 0% by default

toneHigh

toneHigh: number
  • Defined in src/ZegoExpressDefines.ts:907

Tone High. 100% by default

toneLow

toneLow: number
  • Defined in src/ZegoExpressDefines.ts:904

Tone Low. 100% by default

wetGain

wetGain: number
  • Defined in src/ZegoExpressDefines.ts:898

wet gain(dB), range [-20.0, 10.0]

wetOnly

wetOnly: boolean
  • Defined in src/ZegoExpressDefines.ts:895

only wet
